response.original_title: Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas with Vanessa Williams
response.overview: In collaboration with the Ella Fitzgerald Charitable Foundation, the American Pops Orchestra presents an evening celebrating the entire iconic album of holiday classics. This 60-minute performance stars host and vocalist Vanessa Williams with appearances by Dee Dee Bridgewater, Norm Lewis, Carmen Ruby Floyd, Nova Payton, Dave Detwiler and Morgan James.
response.title: Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas with Vanessa Williams
